mapper.insert: insert into route (rou_id, rou_name, pro_id_start, cit_id_start, pro_id_midpoint, cit_id_midpoint, pro_id_end, cit_id_end, rou_price, rou_remarks) values (#{rouId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rouName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{proIdStart,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{citIdStart,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{proIdMidpoint,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{citIdMidpoint,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{proIdEnd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{citIdEnd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rouPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{rouRemarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update route set rou_name = #{rouName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pro_id_start = #{proIdStart,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cit_id_start = #{citIdStart,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pro_id_midpoint = #{proIdMidpoint,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cit_id_midpoint = #{citIdMidpoint,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pro_id_end = #{proIdEnd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cit_id_end = #{citIdEnd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rou_price = #{rouPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, rou_remarks = #{rouRemarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where rou_id = #{rouId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select rou_id, rou_name, pro_id_start, cit_id_start, pro_id_midpoint, cit_id_midpoint, pro_id_end, cit_id_end, rou_price, rou_remarks from route where rou_id = #{rouId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
